librarian_chain module¶

Chain module for use by the librarian

class librarian_chain.EncodeLink¶

Bases: function_chain.Link

Encode and decode strings to pass to a socket

apply(obj)¶

Apply aencoding python string -> byte string Args:

obj: Python3 string
Returns:
Byte string to be use with Socket.send()
unapply(obj)¶

Decode encoding Args:

obj: Byte string, like from Socket.recv()
Returns:
Python3 string
class librarian_chain.JsonLink¶

Bases: function_chain.Link

Link that converts from dictionaries to json and vise-versa

apply(obj)¶

dictionary -> JSON

Args:
obj: Json dictionary
Returns:
JSON string
unapply(obj)¶

JSON -> dictionary

Args:
obj: JSON string
Returns:
Python dictionary object
